resources.string:
Journal App is an app where in users can pen down their thoughts and feelings.
* Login using google authentication * View all entries to their diary. * View the contents of a diary entry. * Add and modify an entry. * Delete an Entry by Swiping. * Update User Profile Using Firebase.

Good day Reviewer, I have tried my best in building this app to the best of my knowledge, I also tried implementiGood day Reviewer, I have tried my best in building this app to the best of my knowledge, I also tried implementing all the features we were ask to do. I hope have tried enough to be qualified to selected for the nanodegree schorlarship.
